lines.text: Are you t-t-telling me that you WON'T give me the egg?
Just take it already. It's not even her egg!
[Prissy walks away crying. Drops egg and it hatches into miniature version of Prissy]
Well, well, well! You WERE P-P-Prissy's egg all along, weren't you?
Blan-sakes! All this fuss over a little egg.

[Prissy think the cops are after her]
Heavens to Betsy, I'm on the lam!
